reviews.review_msg: Good Points: Clear, extremely knowledgeable on 18th Century Lit, Passionate about what she's teaching    Bad Points: hard marker, difficult finals, not enough office hours

Nicky is always organized for class and puts a lot of time into her prepping.  She will also always make time for a student who needs help with any aspect of the course.  However, I found some of Nicky's grading to be a bit harsh and sometimes her expectations were confusing.  If you take this class be ready to participate as she records it.
